title: The TV Show that Brainwashed Children

sources.description: Original:¬† https://youtu.be/9qklT3hYcr4?si=GRLRMu99b0EIaEjT The description says: Start speaking a new language in 3 weeks with Babbel üéâ. Get up to 65% OFF your subscription ‚û°Ô∏è HERE: https://go.babbel.com/1200m65-youtube... In 2007, a show called "Tomorrow's Pioneers" would premier on the Al Aqsa TV station in Gaza. And from the very first episode it has been shrouded in infamy, as the intention behind its creation is shockingly sinister. Leading to it being labeled as the darkest children's show ever created.¬† Huge thank you to Alex Whetham for helping me research for this video! https://www.youtube.com/user/alexo773 SOCIAL MEDIA: Twitter: https://twitter.com/nickcrowleyyt Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nick_crowleyyt PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/NickCrowley Merch: https://crowdmade.com/collections/nic... The pinned comment read: IMPORTANT CORRECTION! At 1:31:08 I meant to say "Condemn the show" as opposed to "Condone the show". Sorry about that, I just misspoke.
